node.title: What happened at COP26?
node.alt: A protester carries a placard depicting the earth and the words 'help me'
node.description: From ministers knee-deep in seawater to China and US teaming up to tackle climate change — here is what happened at the UN COP26 Climate Change Conference
node.content:
["Climate change was described as a \"doomsday\" scenario that required a \"James Bond victory\" at the UN's COP26 conference in Glasgow last week, and 200 countries have now walked away with a new deal.", "\"It's one minute to midnight on the doomsday clock, and we need to act now,\" Mr Johnson said in his opening speech.", "The two-week climate change summit discussed limiting the effects of global warming and addressed how countries planned to cut their emissions by 2030.\u00a0", "
Here is what happened\u00a0
", "", "
UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson\u00a0acknowledges\u00a0that some countries did not live up to the ambition of the summit.(Reuters: Phil Noble)
", "The UK had\u00a0asked at\u00a0the start of the conference for all industrialised countries to adopt more ambitious mid-century targets\u00a0to halve their emissions by 2030.\u00a0", "At the end of the event, Mr Johnson\u00a0said the deal agreed at the COP26 climate talks sounds the \"death knell for coal power\".", "He accepted the summit did not deliver the \"full solution\" to climate change, but said the world was \"undeniably heading in the right direction\".", "So, what was achieved at COP26?\u00a0", "
What is COP26?\u00a0
", "COP stands for \"Conference of the Parties\", and this was its 26th annual meeting.", "The first COP was held in\u00a0Berlin, Germany, in\u00a01995.", "COP\u00a0is the main decision-making body of the\u00a0United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change,\u00a0and includes representatives from all the countries\u00a0that are parties to the convention.\u00a0", "World leaders who attended the COP26 summit included the UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson, United State's President Joe Biden and Prime Minister Scott Morrison.\u00a0", "Notably missing from the summit was\u00a0Russia's President Vladimir Putin,\u00a0China's leader\u00a0\u00a0Xi Jinping and\u00a0Queen Elizabeth II.", "The next conference, COP27, is expected to take place in Egypt\u00a0in late\u00a02022.\u00a0", "
Nations reach climate deal after language was watered down
", "One of the biggest new deals on climate action made at the summit was\u00a0adopted only after\u00a0a last-minute intervention by India to water down the language on cutting emissions from coal.", "The change India proposed replaced the phrase \"phase out\" with \"phase down\".", "Several countries, including small island states, said they were deeply disappointed by the change put forward by India.", "The deal aims to keep alive hopes of capping global warming at 1.5 degrees Celsius above pre-industrial levels in order to prevent the effects of catastrophic climate change.", "
China and US vowed to tackle climate change together
", "In other developments at the talks, the world's two biggest carbon-polluting countries, China and the United States, agreed to work together to increase efforts to fight climate change.", "The agreement vowed to\u00a0cut methane emissions, phase out coal consumption and protect\u00a0forests.", "\"Both sides recognise that there is a gap between the current effort and the Paris agreement,\" China's chief negotiator Xie Zhenhua said.", "US climate envoy John Kerry said the agreement was a statement of support for a successful\u00a0climate summit, with both countries taking a step towards closing the emissions gap.", "\"Every step matters right now and we have a long journey ahead of us,\" he said.\u00a0", "
Australia labelled as a 'great disappointment'
", "Few were impressed with Australia's commits at the conference.\u00a0", "The United Kingdom's top government advisor on climate change, Lord Deben,\u00a0labelled Australia's contribution as a \"great disappointment\u00a0for failing to understand the urgency of reducing emissions.\u00a0", "Prime Minister Scott Morrison formally confirmed at the summit that Australia would commit to a target of net zero emissions by 2050.", "He also announced $500 million in new funding to help Pacific and South-East Asian countries deal with the effects of climate change, bringing Australia's total commitment to $2 billion.", "But he did not announce a new emissions reduction target for 2030.", "Resources Minister Keith Pitt said Australia had outlined how it would meet its 2050 climate target and that demand for Australian coal was expected to keep increasing out to 2030.", "\"Australia produces just four\u00a0per cent of the world's thermal coal. It's some of the world's highest quality, and that's why we'll continue to have markets for decades into the future,\" he said.\u00a0", "
Island nations wanted more ambitious agreements
", "", "
Tuvalu\u00a0Foreign Minister Simon Kofe's\u00a0COP26 video statement made waves around the world.(Reuters:\u00a0Tuvalu\u00a0Ministry of Justice Communication and Foreign Affairs)
", "At\u00a0the last\u00a0talks of the summit, representatives from the Marshall Islands, Tuvalu, Kenya, Ghana and the US all pleaded for greater ambition\u00a0agreements.\u00a0", "Earlier in the week, Foreign Minister Simon Kofe delivered a video address to the summit while standing knee-deep in seawater\u00a0to show how low-lying Pacific nations were at the front line of climate change.", "\"The statement juxtaposes the COP26 setting with the real-life situations faced in Tuvalu due to the impacts of climate change and sea level rise,\" Mr Kofe said.\u00a0", "\"Tuvalu is literally sinking.\"", "
Big crowds rallied for bolder action\u00a0
", "While outside the wall of the conference, tens of thousands of protesters marched in Glasgow and worldwide, demanding bolder action at the UN climate conference.", "The crowd in Glasgow marched streets away from the summit, chanting, \"what do we want, climate justice.\"", "Colourful banners displayed slogans ranging from earnest calls for \"Climate Justice Now\", to the more comical: \"No planet = no beer\".", "Teenage activist Greta Thunberg led the \"Fridays for Future\" protest in Glasgow.", "She labelled the summit as \"failure\" and \"a global north greenwash festival.\"", "", "
'Not a secret that COP26 is a failure': Greta Thunberg attacks world leaders' inaction
"]
